data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Well, there are many advantages. Firstly, being bilingual exposes me to diverse customs, ideas, and perspectives from different cultures. Of course, people would say you can still learn about other cultures without knowing a second language, but language learning really allows me to have a more immersive experience. Moreover, being bilingual also makes travel easier. I love traveling. Knowing what food to order without pointing at pictures and asking for directions when I am lost really makes my traveling more enjoyable. Lastly, being able to communicate with foreign clients or customers is also considered a big advantage in the job market. Taking myself as an example, I have received several job offers this summer because of my proficient English skills. (120 字)
data.referenceText: What are the advantages of growing up bilingual?
data.referenceTranslate: 双语成长的优势是什么?
